decoworld.model.world.entities.enemies

Class WarriorMob

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.StatEntity
        • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.CombatEntity
          • decoworld.model.world.entities.enemies.WarriorMob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasSync, HasCollision, HasCombat, HasHealth, HasStats, StatListener, HasPhysicsBox, HasLevel, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem, java.lang.Iterable<StatType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArcherMob, BanditMob, DemonMob, DragonMob, EliteMob, MiniWarriorMob, SherrifMob, SniperMob, SplittingElite, WolfMob

    public class WarriorMob
extends CombatEntity
implements HasCollision, HasPhysicsBox, HasLevel
    The simpliest and base mob A simple mob that follows the player with variable speed and view distance Hurts player on direct impact (bounces back) with a given playerDamage
